Name: Het IJsboefje
Review Text: Good Italian ice cream, lots of flavours. Located on a friendly local square in Amsterdam-Oost. I usually have the limoncello, chocolate and lemon flavours. Good terrace in front of the shop.

Name: Het IJsboefje
Review Text: Coffee awesome, staff very friendly. After coffee we were having an ice cream, which was also delicious. They have some good vegan options ü§©
